title: Television violence and children
brief_description: Does television violence have an effect on children? This is one of many questions asked of a panel of experts on a subject of concern to parents and teachers. Includes interviews with Dr T Radecky, Chairman of the USA based National Coalition Against Violence. No other credits available.
